content.raw:
Hi Ian,  
I was so happy to see activity around this unique feature of ign-rendering. I tried is as well with recent nvidia drivers and recent optics version and the result was quite similar as in the first comment. Based on your reply I tried it with downgraded drivers and optix 4 but the result was quite similar. Maybe a few more test passed, but not all. Do you have maybe a working image \(e.g., docker\) with your working code? With the help of that we might be able to tune a working environment.  
What is your roadmap regarding the update of the code for recent optix versions?  
Thanks a lot!
content.html:
Hi Ian,
I was so happy to see activity around this unique feature of ign-rendering. I tried is as well with recent nvidia drivers and recent optics version and the result was quite similar as in the first comment. Based on your reply I tried it with downgraded drivers and optix 4 but the result was quite similar. Maybe a few more test passed, but not all. Do you have maybe a working image (e.g., docker) with your working code? With the help of that we might be able to tune a working environment.
What is your roadmap regarding the update of the code for recent optix versions?
Thanks a lot!
